status_update_command_description: It updates the status of the user to its first argument and uses the others for the status message.
get_request_command_description: A simple GET HTTP request slash command calling the URL passed as argument.
post_request_command_description: A simple POST HTTP request slash command calling the URL passed as first argument with payload from second argument.
http_request_command_description: An http request slash command calling through GET/POST depending on 1st argument the URL passed as second argument with optional payload for POST passed as third argument.
my_rocketchat_app_auth_token_desc: The Rocket.Chat authentication token to be used in the header for Rocket.Chat API calls
my_rocketchat_app_user_id_desc: The Rocket.Chat User Id to be used in the header for Rocket.Chat API calls
my_rocketchat_command_description: A Rocket.Chat request slash command calling through GET/POST depending on 1st argument the URL passed as second argument with optional payload for POST passed as third argument.
contextualbar_command_description: A slash command for opening a contextual bar.
